content: camel stitch beanie yarn any yarn of any weight and just adjust the number of row in the brim/stitches around to meet your desired size i used knit picks shine sport 1 50 g skein each in white cream willow coffee and your accent color i used sweet potato or peapod hook a hook appropriate for the weight of your yarn i used a 5 mm h stitches us terminology slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet single_crochet in back loops only single_crochet in blo instead of inserting your hook under the v of the stitch from the row below insert it only under the back loop of the v this will give the fabric in this case the brim of the hat a ribbed effect half-double_crochet half_double_crochet half-double_crochet in the third loop also called camel stitch half_double_crochet if you look at the top of a half_double_crochet stitch you ll see the v where you normally insert your hook behind that will be another horizontal bar that is where you ll insert your hook this forces the v of the stitch forward creating a flat braided looking row half-double_crochet decrease half_double_crochet decrease in the third loop all of your half_double_crochet decrease will still be worked in the 3rd loop in this pattern i found these lay smoother if i didn t pull up a new loop before inserting the hook into the second stitch of the decrease so you yarn over insert hook in 3rd loop of the first stitch pull up a loop insert stitch in the 3rd loop of the second stitch pull up a loop yarn over and pull through all 4 loops on the hook overview the ribbed brim is crocheted first then formed into a ring the hat is then crocheted bottom-up from the brim with decreases at the top chains at the beginnings of row do not count as stitches you should do your first half_double_crochet in the row in the same stitch as your chains i switched to the accent color on row 1 willow on row 8 cream on row 15 and white on row 22 on the hats in the picture when switching colors pick up the new color of yarn after completing the stitches of the previous row and use the new color for the slip_stitch closing that previous row sizing chart size circumference
